alert.note: Alert for Eastern Franklin; Eastern Hampden; Eastern Hampshire; Western Franklin; Western Hampshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 5:21PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Hampshire, central Franklin and central Hampden Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 520 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Granby, or near Amherst, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. Heavy rain in excess of 1 inch SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams. Locations impacted include... Springfield, Chicopee, Holyoke, Amherst, Northampton, West Springfield, Deerfield, Ludlow, South Hadley, Easthampton, Belchertown, Wilbraham, Montague, Granby, Hadley, Sunderland, Hatfield, Williamsburg, Conway and Leverett. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. For your safety, go indoors or to your vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Franklin; Eastern Hampden; Eastern Hampshire; Western Franklin; Western Hampshire
